    Chris Chung

    Data Science Project Portfolio

    Chris Chung is a data scientist with a background in retail who focuses on solving problems in the video game industry. Specifically, Chris uses Python and SQL to solve problems and generate insights to improve player retention and scale data systems.

    This data science portfolio is comprised of projects covering the full spectrum of the data science process. This portfolioâ€™s projects apply Python and SQL within a data science context to provide value to computer game companies.

    Projects Listed by Data Science Process
